author: sina_mobile
title: 高盛：自动驾驶出租车商业化推进 车队规模有望扩大_手机新浪网
text:
高盛：自动驾驶出租车商业化推进 车队规模有望扩大
（来源：智通财经）
智通财经APP获悉，高盛;)发布研报称，对自动驾驶出租车商业化服务区域的扩大持积极态度，在上海，获得许可证的自动驾驶出租车运营商可在指定区域向公众提供完全无人驾驶的自动驾驶出租车服务并收取费用。这将支持自动驾驶出租车行业的发展，同时技术不断进步、大规模部署带来的物料清单(BOM)成本下降以及自动驾驶出租车运营商、汽车原始设备制造商(OEM)和资产所有者之间生态系统的拓展也将起到推动作用。
高盛指，在 2025 年 7 月举办的世界人工智能大会(WAIC)期间，上海向小马智行(PONY.US)、百度集团-SW;)(09888)、文远知行(WRD.US)、锦江出租车、大众交通;)(600611.SH)和上汽集团;)(600104.SH)等公司颁发了智能网联汽车示范运营许可证。

author: Agencia Reforma
title: Lucía Méndez sale del hospital pero sigue tratamiento en casa para recuperarse del covid
text:
Ciudad de México — Luego de que Lucía Méndez fuera hospitalizada por complicaciones de covid-19 , la actriz dejó el hospital y sigue su rehabilitación con un tratamiento para fortalecer sus pulmones desde su casa. Estamos en WhatsApp: siga el canal de Al Día
“Ella se encuentra en casa ya, recuperándose por ahora no podrá hacer ninguna de las actividades que se tenían planeadas hasta nuevo aviso médico”, dijo su publirrelacionista Alberto Gómez Sotelo. “Hablé largo y tendido con Lucía. Está en su casa, ya nada más está descansando”.
La actriz de 70 años estuvo hospitalizada nueve días en el Hospital Español de la Ciudad de México, debido a su estado delicado de salud con tos persistente y complicaciones para respirar, ya que antes de dar positivo a covid tuvo neumonitis.

author: The Business Research Company
title: The Internet Of Things (IOT) Drives Explosive Growth In The Soft
text:
The Internet Of Things (IOT) Drives Explosive Growth In The Soft Robotics Market: Pivotal Factor Influencing Soft Robotics Market Growth in 2025 07-31-2025 06:04 AM CET | Industry, Real Estate & Construction
Press release from: The Business Research Company Soft Robotics Market
Use code ONLINE30 to get 30% off on global market reports and stay ahead of tariff changes, macro trends, and global economic shifts
Soft Robotics Market Size Growth Forecast: What to Expect by 2025?
The size of the soft robotics market has seen an exponential increase recently. Its growth is projected to increase from $1.84 billion in 2024 to $2.29 billion in 2025, exhibiting a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 24.4%. The advancements in the past can be credited to its wide-ranging applications in areas such as medical robotics and its versatility in handling and maneuvering. Other contributing factors include growing interest from defense and military sectors, consumer electronics, wearable robotics, and the use of automation in agriculture.
How Will the Soft Robotics Market Size Evolve and Grow by 2029?
The market size of soft robotics is anticipated to witness a steep rise in the forthcoming years. The growth is estimated to reach a staggering $5.76 billion by 2029, with a 26.0% Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR). This anticipated surge can be linked to the expansion in the food and beverage sector, environmental survey and exploration, international health, and safety concerns, standardization and commercialization, as well as custom solutions for specified uses. Key trends expected during the forecast period comprise bio-mimetic and bio-inspired designs, soft monitoring systems and feedback mechanisms, the incorporation of artificial intelligence (AI), soft exoskeletons for human enhancement, and cooperative robots (cobots).
View the full report here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/report/soft-robotics-global-market-report
What Drivers Are Propelling the Growth of Soft Robotics Market Forward?
Predicted advancements in the Internet of Things (IoT) technology are anticipated to fuel the rise of the soft robotics market. IoT represents a connected framework of computational devices, mechanical instruments, and electronic machinery, each equipped with unique identities and can transfer data bypassing direct human involvement. Soft robotics utilizes IoT sensors to design breakthrough solutions that offer safety, adaptability, and enhanced human interaction, resulting in novel opportunities across various sectors including healthcare, automation, environmental surveillance and so forth. For instance, a report released by Sweden's telecommunications firm, Ericsson, in September 2022 revealed that global IoT connections multiplied to 13.2 billion in 2022, with a projected growth of 18% to 34.7 billion connections by 2028. Consequently, the growing adoption rate of IoT fuels the progress of the soft robotics market. A surge in the soft robotics market is expected due to governmental support and initiatives for robotic technologies, including soft robots. Governmental initiatives encompass the aid provided by government bodies to diverse organizations, industries, projects, programs or individuals at different jurisdictional levels. Several governmental authorities have launched initiatives to stimulate innovation in the integration of robotic technologies. An example of this can be seen in High Value Manufacturing Catapult, a company based in the UK. In July 2024, they reported that the government announced the Advanced Manufacturing Plan in November 2023, aiming to buttress the manufacturing sector with a targeted funding of £4.5 billion ($5.86 billion) over the next five years, starting in 2025, with focus on key sectors such as automotive. Hence, governmental support and initiatives targeted at robotics, including soft robots, act as a driving force for the growth of the soft robotics market.
Get your free sample here:
https://www.thebusinessresearchcompany.com/sample.aspx?id=13160&type=smp
Which Emerging Trends Are Transforming the Soft Robotics Market in 2025?
Leading enterprises in the soft robotics market are concentrating on crafting innovative technology such as soft exoskeleton technology-based robotic hand rehabilitation gloves to guarantee top-notch customer service. These new age robotic gloves, customized for people with hand disabilities, enable effective recovery and rehabilitation. For instance, Siyi Intelligence, a medical equipment manufacturer from China, introduced HRC12 in November 2022. HRC12 is an advanced version of SYREBO soft robotic hand rehabilitation gloves with enhanced soft exoskeleton technology for better usability and accessibility. The HRC12 suite offers comprehensive training modes including fine motor training, stretching mode, pinch training, amongst others, providing a more realistic set of training programs for specialized home-based rehabilitation services.
What Are the Key Segments in the Soft Robotics Market?
The soft robotics market covered in this report is segmented -
1) By Type: Soft Grippers, Cobots, Inflated Robots, Exoskeleton
2) By Component: Hardware, Software
3) By End User: Healthcare, Advanced Manufacturing, Food And Beverages, Logistics, Other End Users
Subsegments:
1) By Soft Grippers: Adaptive Grippers, Suction-Based Grippers
2) By Cobots: Lightweight Cobots, Flexible Cobots
3) By Inflated Robots: Soft Inflatable Structures, Pneumatic Robots
4) By Exoskeletons: Wearable Exoskeletons, Robotic Exoskeletons For Rehabilitation

What Geographic Markets Are Powering Growth in the Soft Robotics Market?
Asia-Pacific was the largest region in the soft robotics market in 2024. Europe is expected to be the fastest-growing region in the forecast period. author: @andaluciainf
title: China registra su mes de julio más caluroso desde 1961 | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Sevilla
text: La temperatura media en China en julio fue la más alta registrada en dicho mes desde 1961, según el Centro Meteorológico Nacional. Durante el séptimo mes del año, la temperatura media en el país asiático alcanzó los 23,2 grados, 1,1 grados más alta que la temperatura en años considerados normales, informó este jueves el subdirector de la institución, Jia Xialong, citado hoy por el diario China Daily. "En julio, China se enfrentó a una combinación de lluvias extremas y temperaturas extremadamente altas en todo el país", señaló Jia en un evento en Pekín. El sur de China sufrió una ola de calor generalizada y prolongada, con múltiples regiones experimentando altas temperaturas continuas durante más de 20 días. Un total de 59 estaciones meteorológicas nacionales registraron temperaturas máximas diarias que rompieron o igualaron récords históricos. Los récords de calor se rompieron en todo el mundo el mes pasado, siendo el 22 de julio el día más caluroso registrado en la Tierra, con una temperatura media diaria global de 17,15°C. El aumento repentino de la temperatura media diaria del 21 al 22 de julio se debió principalmente a temperaturas significativamente más altas de lo normal en el hemisferio norte, particularmente en América del Norte y Europa, así como en la mayor parte de la Antártida, explicó el experto. Según las previsiones del Centro, las temperaturas en la mayor parte de China seguirán siendo más altas de lo habitual en agosto: se esperan dos olas de calor significativas en la primera mitad de agosto, y se prevé que las altas temperaturas disminuyan a finales de mes. En julio, fuertes precipitaciones dejaron más de una treintena de fallecidos y cientos de miles de damnificados en el centro de China. En los últimos veranos, los eventos climáticos extremos han causado estragos en el gigante asiático: los meses estivales de 2023 estuvieron marcados por las citadas inundaciones en Pekín, mientras que, en 2022, diversas olas de calor extremo y sequías azotaron el centro y el este del país. En julio de 2021, precipitaciones de una intensidad inédita en décadas dejaron casi 400 muertos en la provincia central de Henan, que el Ejecutivo chino achacó a una "falta de preparación y de percepción de riesgo" por parte de las autoridades locales . author: CBS Philadelphia
title: Community sends off Lehigh University women's basketball team hoping to win against Duke - CBS Philadelphia
text: The Lehigh University women’s basketball team is one step closer to tipoff. The Mountain Hawks are one of two schools from our area competing in the women’s NCAA tournament. Nikki DeMentri reports in Bethlehem as the team packed up and flew south.

author: Canadian Press
title: Three dead in head-on crash on B.C. Interior highway north of Kamloops
text:
KAMLOOPS, B.C. — Three people are dead after a head-on crash north of Kamloops in British Columbia's Interior.
RCMP Cpl. James Grandy says the accident happened at about 6:50 a.m. on Highway 5, when a south-bound Toyota Corolla struck an oncoming Ford van.
He says the driver and two passengers in the Toyota died while the van driver suffered non-life-threatening injuries.
Grandy says initial investigations determined the driver of the Toyota had been trying to to pass a semi-trailer truck.
Barriere Fire Chief Ashley Wohlgemuth says the crash happened just south of the community, about 64 kilometres north of Kamloops.
Wohlgemuth says a dog in the car also died.
Police say Highway 5 in Louis Creek six kilometres south of Barriere has been closed for the investigation.
Barriere Mayor Ward Stamer says the site of the fatal crash is very close to where a collision claimed two lives on the Labour Day weekend.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published Dec. 28, 2023.
The Canadian Press

author: James Powel
title: Wendy's: One-cent Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger offer is limited per customer
text:
There's only so much bacon that can be brought home.
Wendy's is offering a 1-cent Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger in celebration of National Bacon Day on December 30. The promotion launched Wednesday and requires that customers order the penny burger through the company's app or website.
A company spokesperson confirmed that the offer is valid for one Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger per customer during the promotion.
The deal is an opportunity for customers to relax their wallets after the holiday spending season .
Here's how to claim your 1-cent Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger.
When can you get a Wendy's Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger for a penny Wendy's bacon day deal is available between Dec. 27 and Jan. 2 at participating locations.
Customers can get one Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger for just 1¢, complete with all the fixings: A beefy patty, applewood smoked bacon, American cheese, lettuce, tomato, and mayo.
This woman waited 4 hours to try CosMc's. Here's what she thought of McDonald's new concept. McDonald's plans to open roughly 10,000 new locations, with 50,000 worldwide by 2027 Remember McDonald's snack wraps? Chain teases a new version − inspired by the McCrispy It's go time: McDonald's Happy Meals have Squishmallows starting the day after Christmas National Fast Food Day: See how your favorite fast-food restaurants ranked this year How to get a Wendy's Jr. Bacon Cheeseburger for one penny Download the Wendy's app or visit the company's website , create a rewards account, and click the "Reward Store."
Review the current offers in the reward portal, select the one-cent deal and add it to your order. As long as you have a rewards account, the deal will be added to your cart.
Deal hunters don't need to delete the app once they have secured their penny burger: Wendy's often has other deals throughout the year for reward members, including free fries, chicken nuggets and shakes.
